channel.title: CVE Feed for Honeywell -- PM23/43
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Honeywell -- PM23/43

item.title: CVE-2023-3711|2024-08-02T07:01:57.360Z -- honeywell -- pm23%2F43
item.description: Session Fixation vulnerability in Honeywell PM43 on 32 bit, ARM (Printer web page modules) allows Session Credential Falsification through Prediction.This issue affects PM43 versions prior to P10.19.050004. Update to the latest available firmware version of the respective printers to version MR19.5 (e.g. P10.19.050006).

item.title: CVE-2023-3710|2024-08-02T07:01:57.525Z -- honeywell -- pm23%2F43
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Honeywell PM43 on 32 bit, ARM (Printer web page modules) allows Command Injection.This issue affects PM43 versions prior to P10.19.050004. Update to the latest available firmware version of the respective printers to version MR19.5 (e.g. P10.19.050006).

item.title: CVE-2023-3712|2024-08-02T07:01:57.520Z -- honeywell -- pm23%2F43
item.description:
Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability in Honeywell PM43 on 32 bit, ARM (Printer web page modules) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects PM43 versions prior to P10.19.050004.
Update to the latest available firmware version of the respective printers to version MR19.5 (e.g. P10.19.050006).
